mapper.insert: insert into chathistory (chat_id, user_info, chat_kind, chat_body, insert_date) values (#{chatId}, #{userInfo}, #{chatKind}, #{chatBody}, now())
mapper.select: select chat_kind as chatKind from chathistory where chat_id = #{chatId} and chat_body = "로그인성공"
mapper.update: update chathistory set user_info = #{userInfo}, chat_kind = #{chatKind}, chat_body = #{chatBody}, update_date = now() where chat_id = #{chatId}
